org.apache.hama.commons.math

Class DenseDoubleVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.commons.math.DenseDoubleVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoubleVector

    public final class DenseDoubleVector
extends Object
implements DoubleVector
    Dense double vector implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • slice

        public DoubleVector slice(int start,
                 int end)
        Description copied from interface: DoubleVector
        Validates the input and then slices this vector from start to end, both are INCLUSIVE. For example vec = [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], vec.slice(2, 5) = [2, 3, 4, 5].
        Specified by:
        slice in interface DoubleVector
        Parameters:
        start - must be >= 0 and smaller than the dimension of the vector
        end - must be >= 0 and smaller than the dimension of the vector. This must be greater than or equal to the start.
        Returns:
        a new vector that is only (length) long.

      • sliceUnsafe

        public DoubleVector sliceUnsafe(int start,
                       int end)
        Get a subset of the original vector starting from 'start' and end to 'end', with both ends inclusive.
        Specified by:
        sliceUnsafe in interface DoubleVector
        Parameters:
        start - must be >= 0 and smaller than the dimension of the vector
        end - must be >= 0 and smaller than the dimension of the vector. This must be greater than or equal to the start.
        Returns:
        a new vector that is only (length) long.
